sentences.en: a drop in oil and gas production
sentences.cn: 石油和天然气产量的下降

sentences.en: Because of the slump in domestic demand, production has stopped.
sentences.cn: 由于国内需求大幅下降，生产已经停止。

sentences.en: Food production has already fallen behind the population growth.
sentences.cn: 粮食生产已经跟不上人口增长。

sentences.en: For this production she has learnt the role in Spanish.
sentences.cn: 为了这次演出，她已经学会了用西班牙语演这个角色。

sentences.en: He pushed everyone full speed ahead until production hit a bottleneck.
sentences.cn: 他催促所有人拼命干活，直到生产遭遇瓶颈。

sentences.en: Hydrogen is used extensively in industry for the production of ammonia.
sentences.cn: 氢气在工业上广泛用于制氨。

sentences.en: In 1992, Green moved into video production.
sentences.cn: 1992 年格林转而从事录像制作。

sentences.en: Marx's work was more than a critical study of capitalist production.
sentences.cn: 马克思的著作不仅仅是对资本主义生产的批判性研究。

sentences.en: Oryx is a Dallas-based oil and gas exploration and production concern.
sentences.cn: 奥瑞克斯是一家设在达拉斯的石油和天然气勘探生产公司。

sentences.en: That model won't go into production before late 2007.
sentences.cn: 那种型号要到2007年底才会投入生产。

sentences.en: The company is subcontracting production of most of the parts.
sentences.cn: 该公司外包了大部分零部件的生产。

sentences.en: The Lyric Theatre is presenting a new production of "Over the Bridge".
sentences.cn: 利里克剧院正在上演新排的《桥对面》。

sentences.en: the new Shakespeare production at the Arts Theatre
sentences.cn: 艺术剧院新排演的莎士比亚戏剧

sentences.en: the production of consumer goods
sentences.cn: 消费品生产

sentences.en: The programme was a gold mine for small production companies.
sentences.cn: 这一方案能为产量较小的公司带来滚滚财源。

sentences.en: The whole cast executed the production with truly professional aplomb.
sentences.cn: 全体演职人员以一种真正的专业精神，从容不迫地开始了影片的制作。

sentences.en: Their defense markets are too small to sustain economically viable production runs.
sentences.cn: 他们的国防市场太小，就经济可行性而言不足以维持生产。

sentences.en: They aim to cut production lead times to under 18 months.
sentences.cn: 他们力求把开发周期缩至18个月以下。

sentences.en: Three days into production, the kitty had run dry.
sentences.cn: 才投产3天凑集的钱就用光了。

sentences.en: Through superior production techniques they were able to gain the competitive edge.
sentences.cn: 凭借先进的生产技术，他们得以占据竞争优势。

words.tran_cn: 能生产的；生产的，生产性的；多产的；富有成效的
制作人，制片人；生产者；发生器
产品；结果；[数] 乘积；作品
赢利性；生产率，生产能力；多产性
生产力；生产率；生产能力

phrases.tran_cn: 食品生产；粮食生产；食品加工
高生产率， 大量生产
对…作不必要的发挥； 对…小题大做
生产技术；生产工艺；生产工程学

trans.tran_cn: 生产，产量，产生，排演，灌制，演出
trans.tran_en: the process of making or growing things to be sold, especially in large quantities
